name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No chat on the book of faces

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open messages in messages page, not in the chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension, clicking on a message on a famous social network starting with a f redirects to the "Messages" page instead of opening.

v1.5 :
  Allows ctrl+click and middle button click to open in a new tab instead of redirecting.

v1.6 :
  Removed the name of the website it is used on because apparently it is not clear enough that I'm not affiliated with them and they can remove my thing without even warning me before.
